name: LIMITED ENERGY
description:
/ PLAY FULLSCREEN FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE /

---

You are a little robot left to rust in the middle of nowhere, with enough energy to power only one of your modules at a time. Can you juggle your options to survive?

---

INSTRUCTIONS

Use your mouse to grab the main connector

You can fast-pick the connector with the right-click button

---

A little something for the GMTK GameJam 2019, theme "Only One"

Code by @Galbix

Art by Álvaro Farfán
